Name: pipework-1.1.5
ModeratorComment: While there still may be use for this application, the author has stated that under recent versions of docker, the use of this container is probably not required
Overview: This is for unRAID 6.0 and 6.1. Pipework allows you to have a static or dynamic ip for a docker container. This is the unraid implementation of the dreamcat4 pipework docker container
